name: The Future Is Now
wikiSummary: According to The Future Is Now Songfacts, the song sees Dexter Holland singing of the dangers of technology. He explained to Spinner: "You see people on their cell phones constantly. Everybody is in the same room but no one is looking at each other or speaking."
wikiText: According to The Future Is Now Songfacts, the song sees Dexter Holland singing of the dangers of technology. He explained to Spinner: "You see people on their cell phones constantly. Everybody is in the same room but no one is looking at each other or speaking."
